name: Tenser's Floating Disk
flavorText: “Oh, this? It follows me everywhere, like a porter that never needs to rest.”
text: You create a slightly concave, circular plane of force that floats a foot off the ground and can carry what you lay upon it. The disk is 3 feet in diameter and 1 inch deep at its center. It remains stationary unless you move more than 5 squares away from it, in which case it moves with your base speed once per round until it is within 5 squares of you. You can command the disk to move up to your speed as a move action. If you are more than 5 squares from the disk for 2 consecutive rounds, the disk disappears, dropping whatever it was carrying.  Your Arcana check result determines the maximum load the disk can carry.
